column5: Working on a project or attending training in Houston? Need a short term place to stay for a few days, weeks or months?   Cheerful fully-furnished rooms in the Historic Houston Heights. You will have exclusive use of a large bedroom plus 2nd bedroom/living room, private bathroom, mini-kitchen and laundry. Off street parking and wifi.   Walking distance to wonderful Heights restaurants and bars. Nearby hike and bike trail. Convenient bus lines to downtown, museum district and medical center.
